mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vacates (doctor_id, description, apply_date, vacate_date, status, admin_id, admin_date) VALUES (#{doctorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{vacateDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM vacates WHERE vacate_id = #{vacateId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
